existing_features.title: Add 3D human characters to the cafe scene, including at least: (a) seated customers at tables, (b) a customer waiting at the counter, and (c) a walking customer moving through the cafe.
Add 3D pet dog characters accompanying the humans in the cafe scene (e.g., sitting/standing near seated humans and near the counter), with simple idle motion.
Ensure the added humans and dogs render in the currently active cafe scene path (the always-available basic room/fallback scene), and keep performance stable on typical devices.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add humans to the cafe scene (sitting, waiting at counter, walking) and include pet dogs with them
